com.orchestranetworks.ui
Interface UILabelRendererForHierarchyContext

All Superinterfaces:
UIBodyWriter, UILabelRendererContext, UIResourceLocator
public interface UILabelRendererForHierarchyContext
extends UILabelRendererContext, UIResourceLocator

Provides a context for displaying a hierarchy node.

Warning: if the node is a root, an orphan's parent, or an enumeration node, it does not correspond to a table record (that is, method getOccurrence() returns null).

See Also:
UILabelRendererForHierarchy

Method Detail

getOccurrence

public Adaptation getOccurrence()
Returns the current record that is being displayed.

Warning: this method returns null if current node is a root or an orphans parent, or an enumeration node.

Specified by:
getOccurrence in interface UILabelRendererContext

getEnumerationValue

public Object getEnumerationValue()
Returns the current enumeration value if isEnumerationNode() is true. Otherwise, this method returns null.

See Also:
getOccurrence()

getHierarchyNode

public HierarchyNode getHierarchyNode()
Returns the current hierarchy node that is being displayed.

getLabelFromDefaultPattern

public String getLabelFromDefaultPattern()
Returns the localized label as specified by the current hierarchy configuration.

If this configuration does not specify a label pattern, then it returns the localized label as specified by the default pattern.

The default pattern is looked up on the elements <defaultLabel [xml:lang="..."]> which are specified by the table definition.

Specified by:
getLabelFromDefaultPattern in interface UILabelRendererContext
See Also:
Table Definition

isEnumerationNode

public boolean isEnumerationNode()
Returns true if the current node is an enumeration node, false otherwise. An enumeration corresponds to a xs:enumeration in the data model.

In this case, the method getOccurrence() returns null.

See Also:
getEnumerationValue()

isOrphansParent

public boolean isOrphansParent()
Returns true if the current node is an orphan's parent, false otherwise.

In this case, the method getOccurrence() returns null.

isRoot

public boolean isRoot()
Returns true if the current node is the root of the hierarchy, false otherwise.

In this case, the method getOccurrence() returns null.

isTarget

public boolean isTarget()
Returns true if the current record is a target table record, false otherwise.

The target table is the table from which the hierarchy was built.

isTerminal

public boolean isTerminal()
Returns true if the current record has no children in the hierarchy, false otherwise.

isDefaultLinkEnabled

public boolean isDefaultLinkEnabled()
Returns true if the behavior for the node's selection is the default one, false otherwise.

Default is true.

Since:
5.2.0
See Also:
setDefaultLinkEnabled(boolean)

setDefaultLinkEnabled

public void setDefaultLinkEnabled(boolean isDefaultLinkEnabled)
Use this method to set whether or not, the default behavior for the node's selection shall be used.

If false, the desired selection link(s) have to be explicitly generated by this label renderer, for example by adding specific href HTML tag(s).

Default is true.

Since:
5.2.0
See Also:
getURLForSelectingCurrentNode()

getURLForSelectingCurrentNode

public String getURLForSelectingCurrentNode()
Returns the URL for selecting the current record as a hierarchy node.

Since:
5.2.0

addPreviewLink

public void addPreviewLink(String aURL,
                           String aLabel)
Adds a preview link. By a click on the link, the standard modal inner pop-up is displayed with the specified URL.

Recommendations concerning the specified URL:

  • The use of a UIHttpManagerComponent.createOnUILabelRendererForHierarchyContext is generally recommended.
  • The inner pop-up works with an iframe, so an external URL may not work.
  • The methods getURLForSelection from the UIResourceLocator should not be used, because that kind of URL changes the state of the current session. They must be invoked in the current window only, not in a pop-up.

Parameters:
aURL - the URL of the page to open.
aLabel - the label of the link.
Since:
5.2.2
See Also:
UIHttpManagerComponent.createOnUILabelRendererForHierarchyContext(UILabelRendererForHierarchyContext), UIComponentWriter.buildButtonPreview(String, UserMessage)
